name: Tectonic Detector
uniques: Population loss from nuclear attacks [-50]% [in this city]

name: Artificial Ecoregion
uniques: [+1 Food] from [Organic] tiles [in this city] <when number of [Food] is greater than [9]>
[+1 Food] from [Organic] tiles [in this city] <when number of [Food] is greater than [19]>

civilopediaText.text: Species that humans intentionally transport to new regions can subsequently become successfully.
